title: Championship Jewels
body:
Just a quick question. 
Will the leftover championship jewels actually be worth something when you disenchant them after they expire?
The project ones were a real disappointment when i saw it was only like 1 IP.

Thank you!

replies.body: No idea!  I don't have any information on what would become of jewels after the event beyond what's available in the [Worlds 2016](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-) guide.  I recommend using whatever you can until the event is over!

Porocles, you guys wouldn't be sneaky about this, right?
At the end of worlds say something like: "And now if you got 10+ jewels you can get an extra special limited icon for them."

Cause i got my lvl 2 worlds icon and would love to save my IP for the mecha vs Minions and coming halloween icon.

PS: Any infos on how long the M V M icon will be in store for ip?? Have not seen any info about it so far...
